20110109013052.000|20110109013053.000|CC1|IT WAS GUNFIRE THAT SHATTERED

20110109013055.000|20110109013056.000|CC1|STUNNED THE NATION AND SHOCKED  
20110109013056.000|20110109013057.000|CC1|THE POLITICAL ESTABLISHMENT.    
20110109013057.000|20110109013059.000|CC1|A GUNMAN FIRED INTO A CROWD AT A
20110109013059.000|20110109013101.000|CC1|PUBLIC EVENT OUTSIDE OF A       
20110109013101.000|20110109013102.000|CC1|SUPERMARKET, CRITICALLY WOUNDING
20110109013102.000|20110109013104.000|CC1|CONGRESSWOMAN GABRIELLE GIFFORDS
20110109013104.000|20110109013104.000|CC1|AND KILLING OR WOUNDING SEVERAL 
20110109013104.000|20110109013108.000|CC1|OTHERS.                         
20110109013108.000|20110109013109.000|CC1|HERE IS WHAT WE KNOW.           
20110109013109.000|20110109013110.000|CC1|CONGRESSWOMAN GIFFORDS WAS SHOT 
20110109013110.000|20110109013114.000|CC1|IN THE HEAD, BUT DOCTORS ARE    
20110109013114.000|20110109013115.000|CC1|NOW OPTIMISTIC ABOUT HER        
20110109013115.000|20110109013115.000|CC1|PROSPECTS.                      
20110109013115.000|20110109013116.000|CC1|A 22-YEAR-OLD GUNMAN IS IN      
20110109013116.000|20110109013116.000|CC1|POLICE CUSTODY, HIS MOTIVE STILL
20110109013116.000|20110109013118.000|CC1|UNKNOWN.                        
20110109013118.000|20110109013120.000|CC1|AT LEAST SIX PEOPLE ARE KNOWN   
20110109013120.000|20110109013122.000|CC1|DEAD, INCLUDING A FEDERAL JUDGE,
20110109013122.000|20110109013123.000|CC1|AND A NINE-YEAR-OLD GIRL.       
20110109013123.000|20110109013124.000|CC1|AT LEAST TEN OTHERS HAVE BEEN   
20110109013124.000|20110109013126.000|CC1|WOUNDED.

20110109013126.000|20110109013129.000|CC1|PRESIDENT OBAMA CONDEMNED THE   
20110109013129.000|20110109013129.000|CC1|SHOOTING OF A LAWMAKER HE CALLED
20110109013129.000|20110109013133.000|CC1|A FRIEND.                       
20110109013133.000|20110109013134.000|CC1|>> SHE IS NOT ONLY AN           
20110109013134.000|20110109013136.000|CC1|EXTRAORDINARY PUBLIC SERVANT,   
20110109013136.000|20110109013140.000|CC1|BUT SHE IS ALSO SOMEBODY WHO IS 
20110109013140.000|20110109013142.000|CC1|WARM AND CARING.                
20110109013142.000|20110109013145.000|CC1|SHE IS WELL-LIKED BY HER        
20110109013145.000|20110109013146.000|CC1|COLLEAGUES AND WELL-LIKED BY HER
20110109013146.000|20110109013148.000|CC1|CONSTITUENTS.

20110109013207.000|20110109013208.000|CC1|CONFIRMING TO CBS NEWS THAT THEY

20110109013217.000|20110109013219.000|CC1|SUPERMARKET IN NORTHWEST TUCSON

20110109013231.000|20110109013232.000|CC1|IT WENT THROUGH HER BRAIN.      
20110109013232.000|20110109013234.000|CC1|>> THE SUSPECT HAS BEEN

20110109013244.000|20110109013246.000|CC1|KILLING A NINE-YEAR-OLD GIRL AND

20110109013249.000|20110109013250.000|CC1|>> LOUGHNER IS NOW IN POLICE

20110109013252.000|20110109013255.000|CC1|IT'S STILL EVOLVING.            
20110109013255.000|20110109013256.000|CC1|>> EYEWITNESS KEN PENNER WAS

20110109013311.000|20110109013312.000|CC1|THE THREE-TERM DEMOCRAT.        
20110109013312.000|20110109013314.000|CC1|SHE SENT OUT A TWEET AT 10:00   
20110109013314.000|20110109013314.000|CC1|A.M. LOCAL TIME AS THE MEETING  
20110109013314.000|20110109013322.000|CC1|STARTED.

20110109013323.000|20110109013325.000|CC1|TARGET OF VIOLENT PROTEST,

20110109013331.000|20110109013333.000|CC1|OFFICE WAS SMASHED IN SHORTLY   
20110109013333.000|20110109013334.000|CC1|AFTER SHE CAST HER VOTE FOR THE 
20110109013334.000|20110109013336.000|CC1|HEALTH CARE BILL.

20110109013351.000|20110109013352.000|CC1|INFORMATION ABOUT A POSSIBLE    
20110109013352.000|20110109013353.000|CC1|MOTIVE, KATIE.                  
20110109013353.000|20110109013355.000|CC1|>> ALL RIGHT, KAREN BROWN       
20110109013355.000|20110109013355.000|CC1|REPORTING TONIGHT FROM TUCSON.  
20110109013355.000|20110109013356.000|CC1|KAREN, THANKS VERY MUCH FOR THAT
20110109013356.000|20110109013358.000|CC1|REPORTING REPORT.               
20110109013358.000|20110109013359.000|CC1|JOINING US BY PHONE FROM TUCSON 
20110109013359.000|20110109013401.000|CC1|IS AN EYEWITNESS TO THE         
20110109013401.000|20110109013405.000|CC1|SHOOTING, DR. STEVEN RAIL.      
20110109013405.000|20110109013408.000|CC1|DR. RAIL, YOU WERE AT THIS      
20110109013408.000|20110109013408.000|CC1|EVENT.                          
20110109013408.000|20110109013409.000|CC1|CAN YOU TELL US FROM YOUR       
20110109013409.000|20110109013409.000|CC1|PERSPECTIVE WHAT HAPPENED?      
20110109013409.000|20110109013411.000|CC1|>> I JUST WENT OVER THERE TO    
20110109013411.000|20110109013412.000|CC1|MEET CONGRESSMAN GIFFORDS WITH A
20110109013412.000|20110109013413.000|CC1|FRIEND, AND I HAD WALKED IN     
20110109013413.000|20110109013415.000|CC1|FRONT OF THE TABLE, SAW HER     
20110109013415.000|20110109013417.000|CC1|WEARING A RED TAILORED JACKET   
20110109013417.000|20110109013417.000|CC1|AND SMILING AND TALKING TO      
20110109013417.000|20110109013420.000|CC1|SOMEBODY ELSE.                  
20110109013420.000|20110109013421.000|CC1|I PROCEEDED TO THE SIDE OF THE  
20110109013421.000|20110109013424.000|CC1|TABLE, AND A FEW SECONDS LATER I
20110109013424.000|20110109013427.000|CC1|LOOKED UP AND SAW HER BEING     
20110109013427.000|20110109013428.000|CC1|SHOT, AND THE GUNMAN BEGAN JUST 
20110109013428.000|20110109013429.000|CC1|SPRAYING EVERYBODY AT POINT-    
20110109013429.000|20110109013431.000|CC1|BLANK RANGE.                    
20110109013431.000|20110109013432.000|CC1|IT WASN'T LIKE HE WAS PICKING   
20110109013432.000|20110109013433.000|CC1|PEOPLE OUT.                     
20110109013433.000|20110109013435.000|CC1|HE JUST BEGAN SHOOTING AT       
20110109013435.000|20110109013440.000|CC1|EVERYBODY WHO WAS CLOSE TO HIM  
20110109013440.000|20110109013440.000|CC1|AND IT WAS KIND OF A CONSTRICTED
20110109013440.000|20110109013441.000|CC1|AREA.                           
20110109013441.000|20110109013441.000|CC1|>> AND HOW MANY PEOPLE, ABOUT,  
20110109013441.000|20110109013442.000|CC1|WERE AT THIS EVENT?             
20110109013442.000|20110109013444.000|CC1|>> THERE WERE ONLY ABOUT 20 TO  
20110109013444.000|20110109013445.000|CC1|25 PEOPLE, SO PROBABLY AT LEAST 
20110109013445.000|20110109013448.000|CC1|HALF OF THE PEOPLE WERE SHOT.   
20110109013448.000|20110109013450.000|CC1|AND THE GUNMAN WAS APPREHENDED  
20110109013450.000|20110109013452.000|CC1|BY, I BELIEVE, ONE OF HER AIDES 
20110109013452.000|20110109013453.000|CC1|WHO TACKLED HIM, AND I DID HELP 
20110109013453.000|20110109013455.000|CC1|HOLD HIM DOWN AS WELL.          
20110109013455.000|20110109013457.000|CC1|AND THEN I RENDERED SOME AID TO 
20110109013457.000|20110109013459.000|CC1|SOME OF THE PEOPLE THAT WERE    
20110109013459.000|20110109013500.000|CC1|SHOT, BUT THERE WERE SEVERAL    
20110109013500.000|20110109013500.000|CC1|THAT WERE CLEARLY MORTALLY      
20110109013500.000|20110109013502.000|CC1|WOUNDED RIGHT AWAY.             
20110109013502.000|20110109013503.000|CC1|>> AND CAN YOU TELL ME A LITTLE 
20110109013503.000|20110109013505.000|CC1|BIT ABOUT THE SHOOTER'S BEHAVIOR
20110109013505.000|20110109013509.000|CC1|WHEN HE WAS TACKLED OR PRIOR TO 
20110109013509.000|20110109013510.000|CC1|HIS BEING TACKLED?              
20110109013510.000|20110109013511.000|CC1|WAS HE SAYING ANYTHING?         
20110109013511.000|20110109013513.000|CC1|YELLING ANYTHING?               
20110109013513.000|20110109013514.000|CC1|>> I DID NOT HEAR HIM YELL      
20110109013514.000|20110109013516.000|CC1|ANYTHING.                       
20110109013516.000|20110109013518.000|CC1|HE JUST SEEMED TO BE-- HE HAD A 
20110109013518.000|20110109013520.000|CC1|DETERMINED LOOK ON HIS FACE.    
20110109013520.000|20110109013522.000|CC1|AND HE JUST BEGAN SHOOTING.     
20110109013522.000|20110109013524.000|CC1|HE WAS WEARING DARK CLOTHES, A  
20110109013524.000|20110109013527.000|CC1|LITTLE BIT SHABBY, SHABBILY     
20110109013527.000|20110109013528.000|CC1|DRESSED, AND HE REALLY, I THINK 
20110109013528.000|20110109013530.000|CC1|HE REALLY THOUGHT HE WOULD BE   
20110109013530.000|20110109013531.000|CC1|GETTING AWAY.                   
20110109013531.000|20110109013532.000|CC1|>> AND TELL US A LITTLE BIT     
20110109013532.000|20110109013533.000|CC1|ABOUT THE CONGRESSWOMAN'S       
20110109013533.000|20110109013534.000|CC1|CONDITION.                      
20110109013534.000|20110109013535.000|CC1|SHE WAS DESCRIBED AS GRAVELY    
20110109013535.000|20110109013536.000|CC1|WOUNDED.                        
20110109013536.000|20110109013537.000|CC1|NOW DOCTORS ARE SAYING THEY ARE 
20110109013537.000|20110109013539.000|CC1|VERY OPTIMISTIC ABOUT HER       
20110109013539.000|20110109013540.000|CC1|PROGNOSIS, BUT CAN YOU TELL US  
20110109013540.000|20110109013542.000|CC1|ABOUT THE EXTENT OF HER WOUNDS  
20110109013542.000|20110109013545.000|CC1|AT THE TIME?                    
20110109013545.000|20110109013546.000|CC1|>> YES.                         
20110109013546.000|20110109013546.000|CC1|I DID BRIEFLY CHECK ON HER.     
20110109013546.000|20110109013548.000|CC1|SHE WAS CONSCIOUS.              
20110109013548.000|20110109013550.000|CC1|I WAS VERY ENCOURAGED, BECAUSE  
20110109013550.000|20110109013551.000|CC1|SHE WAS SITTING.                
20110109013551.000|20110109013554.000|CC1|SOMEONE HAD PROPPED HER SITTING 
20110109013554.000|20110109013556.000|CC1|UP, WAS TENDING TO HER, AND I   
20110109013556.000|20110109013557.000|CC1|COULD SEE SHE HAD BLOOD ON HER  
20110109013557.000|20110109013559.000|CC1|FACE AND A HEAD WOUND, BUT SHE  
20110109013559.000|20110109013600.000|CC1|WAS MOVING HER EXTREMITIES AND  
20110109013600.000|20110109013601.000|CC1|WAS CONSCIOUS, SO I WAS VERY    
20110109013601.000|20110109013602.000|CC1|ENCOURAGED THAT IT WAS NOT A    
20110109013602.000|20110109013605.000|CC1|FATAL WOUND.                    
20110109013605.000|20110109013605.000|CC1|>> AND TRAGICALLY WE HEARD THERE
20110109013605.000|20110109013606.000|CC1|WAS A NINE-YEAR-OLD GIRL ON THE 
20110109013606.000|20110109013608.000|CC1|SCENE?                          
20110109013608.000|20110109013610.000|CC1|>> YES, THERE WAS.              
20110109013610.000|20110109013610.000|CC1|SHE WAS BEING GIVEN CPR BUT     
20110109013610.000|20110109013615.000|CC1|AGAIN, C.P.R. IN A GUNSHOT      
20110109013615.000|20110109013616.000|CC1|TRAUMA IS A LAST-DITCH EFFORT   
20110109013616.000|20110109013617.000|CC1|KIND OF THING.                  
20110109013617.000|20110109013618.000|CC1|>> Couric: IT WAS FORTUNATE YOU 
20110109013618.000|20110109013621.000|CC1|WERE THERE TO ADMINISTER AID TO 
20110109013621.000|20110109013622.000|CC1|SOME OF VICTIMS, AND THANK YOU  
20110109013622.000|20110109013623.000|CC1|SO MUCH FOR TALKING TO US       
20110109013623.000|20110109013624.000|CC1|TONIGHT, DR. STEPHEN RAIL WE SO 
20110109013624.000|20110109013626.000|CC1|APPRECIATE YOUR TIME.           
20110109013626.000|20110109013627.000|CC1|>> THANK YOU, KATIE.            
20110109013627.000|20110109013628.000|CC1|>> Couric: THE SHOOTER'S        
20110109013628.000|20110109013631.000|CC1|MOTIVATION IS STILL UNKNOWN, BUT
20110109013631.000|20110109013631.000|CC1|AS KAREN BROWN JUST TOLD US,    
20110109013631.000|20110109013632.000|CC1|THIS IS NOT THE FIRST TIME THAT

20110109013644.000|20110109013647.000|CC1|SHE DID-- HER OFFICE ANYWAY,
